Package com.brycethuilot.auto_mailer

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ApplicationWindow
    Main class for Application.
    Config
    Config class saves settings in users home directory.
    Email
    Email class can be used to send emails with attachments from the address set in the config It uses office365 smtp to send mail
    Letter
    Creates a PDF that is to be sent as a physical letter to the insured in case no email is present on QQ for an insured Can also open printer dialog to print and send, with the necessary PDF pages
    NarragansettBay
    NarragansettBay is a subclass of Policy.
    OceanHarbor
    OceanHarbor is a subclass of Policy.
    Policy
    Policy is the abstract base class for spefic policy types by company to extend from It is used to read a policy from a PDF and extract its contents, update the policy in QQ Catalyst, Send to the insured and print for a mortgagee Currently when extracting information from the PDF it can read Insured name Company name Insured address Policy number Expiration and Effective Dates Coverages premium Deductibles If it is a dwelling policy If it is a renewal or not It is abstract so that the other classes can implement the specifics for different companies policy types and how they format their PDFs differently but can provide an interface for ApplicationWindow to call the Policy.updateOnQQ() Policy.mailToInsured(ApplicationWindow) and Policy.printMortgagee() functions regardless of company
    Printer
    static class created to print PDDocuments using PDFBox's printing classes Uses the system printing dialog
    QQUpdater
    Class used to open a chrome window controlled by a web driver can update a policy and get email assocated with user on QQCatalyst.com
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    NotSignedInException
    Created so that if QQ is not signed in and a developer tries to call getEmail(String) or updatePolicy(String, String, double, HashMap, int[], boolean) it will throw and expection
